name: Spirit Tap
baseDescription: Gives you a 20% chance to gain a 100% bonus to your Spirit after killing a target that yields experience.  For the duration, your Mana will regenerate at a 50% rate while casting.  Lasts 15 sec.

name: Blackout
baseDescription: Gives your Shadow damage spells a 2% chance to stun the target for 3 sec.

name: Shadow Affinity
baseDescription: Reduces the threat generated by your Shadow spells by 16%.

name: Improved Shadow Word: Pain
baseDescription: Increases the duration of your Shadow Word: Pain spell by 3 sec.

name: Shadow Focus
baseDescription: Reduces your target's chance to resist your Shadow spells by 2%.

name: Improved Psychic Scream
baseDescription: Reduces the cooldown of your Psychic Scream spell by 2 sec.

name: Improved Mind Blast
baseDescription: Reduces the cooldown of your Mind Blast spell by 0.5 sec.

name: Mind Flay
baseDescription: Assault the target's mind with Shadow energy, causing 75 Shadow damage over 3 sec and slowing their movement speed by 50%.

name: Improved Fade
baseDescription: Decreases the cooldown of your Fade ability by 3 sec.

name: Shadow Reach
baseDescription: Increases the range of your Shadow damage spells by 6%.

name: Shadow Weaving
baseDescription: Your Shadow damage spells have a 20% chance to cause your target to be vulnerable to Shadow damage.  This vulnerability increases the Shadow damage dealt to your target by 3% and lasts 15 sec.  Stacks up to 5 times.

name: Silence
baseDescription: Silences the target, preventing them from casting spells for 5 sec.

name: Vampiric Embrace
baseDescription: Afflicts your target with Shadow energy that causes all party members to be healed for 20% of any Shadow spell damage you deal for 1 min.

name: Improved Vampiric Embrace
baseDescription: Increases the percentage healed by Vampiric Embrace by an additional 5%.

name: Darkness
baseDescription: Increases your Shadow spell damage by 4%.

name: Shadowform
baseDescription: Assume a Shadowform, increasing your Shadow damage by 15% and reducing Physical damage done to you by 15%.  However, you may not cast Holy spells while in this form.
